item.title: Final Review
item.description: CSCA48 - Final Review Winter 2020 If you think it won’t work in C, it probably will. Units 1 + 2: Variables and lockers: Uniquely numbered in increasing order, reserved only for the program using the box to store and access information in said box. Three ways to get a locker: Variable Declaration int boostMyMark = 420; // locker has been created Return Values return boostMyMark; // new locker has been created, (copied value) Input Parameters void killAverage(double currentAvg, double midtermMark) {.
